text: @realDonaldTrump #Coronavirus Trump, U R worthless. The Governors had to find all the Ventilators; you were no help. Thank God they weren’t all needed. Each state shouldn’t have to find testing, that’s our Federal Government’s job, but your poor leadership has dumped that onto the Governors too.
